StringsInsufficientHexLength(uint256,uin.details: The `value` string doesn't fit in the specified `length`.

params.deployerAddress: Contains the address of the deployer of the contract
params.deploymentAddress: Contains the address where the contract was deployed
params.deploymentIndex: Contains the corresponding ID for the deployment
params.deploymentName: Contains the name of the deployed contract

DeployedContract(address,uint256,address.notice: This event stores in the blockchain when a new contract is deployed
